sections.text: A midnight train promises a one-night journey to Meridian, a city of wonders.

options.description: Board the train and take a window seat.
Skip the train and wait for daylight travel.

sections.text: Onboard, a mysterious passenger offers you a sealed envelope with a riddle.

options.description: Politely decline and watch the passing landscape.

sections.text: Daylight travel is calm but you miss the train's secret. Life goes on with small comforts.
The riddle leads you to a hidden compartment under your seat containing a small key.

options.description: Use the key at the train's observation car.
Keep the key and ask the passenger about it.

sections.text: You enjoy the scenery and arrive refreshed in Meridian with a new appreciation for quiet journeys.
The key opens a chest of postcards from travelers who found new lives in Meridian.
The passenger reveals they were testing your curiosity. They offer you a job as a guide in Meridian.
